title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: I am currently accumulating HBAR during these low prices and want to transfer them to my ledger nano s plus. I know i can transfer to my ledger however it is not as straightforward as others and I understand I need to download something called hashgraph first?I have my HBAR on Crypto.com and to my understanding I need to send my HBAR to Hashgraph and then from there I can then send to my ledger? If someone can please confirm, thanks

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Do you mean hashpack? Hashgraph is the name of the coin itself. I found this tutorial, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1gEzyICLW4gDWYOR

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: Yes sorry Hashpack, thanks for the link will have a look. I have seen a few videos online but was just checking to see if there was an easier way of doing it or if there is only one way.

comments.author: JamesDaniel90
comments.body: I currently have all my HBAR on Crypto.com.After what has happened to FTX this week I now want to have everything on my ledger. What is the best way of transferring my HBAR to my ledger? Or is the only way for me to send my HBAR from crypto.com to hashpack wallet and then to my ledger from there?

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on November 10, 2022, 03:46:59 PMI currently have all my HBAR on Crypto.com.After what has happened to FTX this week I now want to have everything on my ledger. Self-custody is always meant to be in the cryptocurrency ecosystem.Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on November 10, 2022, 03:46:59 PMWhat is the best way of transferring my HBAR to my ledger? Or is the only way for me to send my HBAR from crypto.com to hashpack wallet and then to my ledger from there?According to Ledger supported cryptocurrencies information site, you can use a Ledger Live or MyHbarWallet, on MyHbarWallet you can just connect the wallet with your HW. Do note, MyHbarWallet only support Ledger Nano. In case you have another device, the only option left is to use Ledger Live. It seems HBAR is fully supported on Ledge, for full references and a how-to guide, refer to https://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/articles/360009833299?docs=true.
